__e: If Adrian has the baby, that's not good.

Oh, you know what Mr. Adrian did?
A symbol of hope and peace to millions of people, would've been lost to the world forever had it not been for the bravery of one man, former detective Adrian Monk.
Adrian Monk had this much confidence to begin with... This'll probably kill him.
You work for Adrian Monk, Natalie. That makes you and your family my business.
So, Adrian, do you think you've seen that guy before?

I just thought if you saw Adrian, you could pass along the message that I can't meet them tonight.
